message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can we meet in the middle at $12000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $12000. I can do $13500, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm not sure I can stretch to $13500. Can you meet me at $11000?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11000 and $13500, so I'll offer you $12250. That's the best I can do.
I'm getting closer, but I'm still a bit far from $12250. Can you meet me at $11500?
